dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Yes it is all away...nothing to worry about anymore.

dialogue.name: Chuuni
dialogue.dialogueText: I’m glad, that was really embarrassing!

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Chuuni seemed quite in a huff because of what I did.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Anyway you shouldn’t even be in the boy’s room.

dialogue.name: Chuuni
dialogue.dialogueText: Sorry Takeshi-Kun, but I am wherever I am needed!

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: And she is needed in the men’s room? I really want to know what that says about her as a person...
